programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2111
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep11
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: Qian, a rich boy obsessed with martial arts, joins a Kung Fu school where he meets and falls for the youngest daughter of the school master. Being a normal student, he meets a mysterious man who teaches him kung fu that allows him to win a duel and marry his love. It is then that the mysterious man's identity is finally revealed.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Meis father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nations Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughters company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Vengeance is a Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Whose Baby is in the Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.desc: Tamil Action Love Movie, Starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Madonna Sebastian, T. Rajenda, Vikranth, Chandini Tamilarasan & Others

programme.title: Elvis
programme.desc: From Oscar-nominated visionary filmmaker Baz Luhrmann comes Warner Bros. Pictures' drama Elvis, starring Austin Butler and Oscar winner Tom Hanks.The film explores the life and music of Elvis Presley (Butler), seen through the prism of his complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker (Hanks). The story delves into the complex dynamic between Presley and Parker spanning over 20 years, from Presley's rise to fame to his unprecedented stardom, against the backdrop of the evolving cultural landscape and loss of innocence in America. Central to that journey is one of the most significant and influential people in Elvis's life, Priscilla Presley (Olivia DeJonge).'

Pictures' drama Elvis, starring Austin Butler and Oscar winner Tom Hanks.The film explores the life and music of Elvis Presley (Butler), seen through the prism of his complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker (Hanks). The story delves into the complex dynamic between Presley and Parker spanning over 20 years, from Presley's rise to fame to his unprecedented stardom, against the backdrop of the evolving cultural landscape and loss of innocence in America. Central to that journey is one of the most significant and influential people in Elvis's life, Priscilla Presley (Olivia DeJonge).'

programme.desc: After a car bomb attack that killed his wife and left him blind, Inspector Haller remains determined to track down the murderer. With the help of a streetwise taxi driver, he tracks down the psychopath and sees that justice is served through to the end.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: The Boy Who Wants To Live
programme.desc: 70-year-old Willi catches Malian refugee Nama stealing, but decides not to report him. Having been a refugee once, Willi sees a part of himself in Nama, and brings him home. However, Namas decision further frays his relationship with his son.

programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her familys biggest fear is not her going to jail, its preserving their honour.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Maxs stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 10
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q make bizarre passes at supermarket shoppers, then pose as roving reporters asking insane questions. And the big loser is the butt of the joke after being prescribed a painfully invasive punishment.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Looking to solve the disappearance of her explorer father, the smart and fearless Lara undertakes a harrowing journey to locate the mythical lost tomb he had been searching for.

programme.title: Hall Pass
programme.desc: Rick and Fred are best friends who have each been married for many years. When the two men begin to show signs of restlessness at home, their wives granting them a "hall pass," one week of freedom to do whatever they want...

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 11
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr hit a bull's-eye at a clothing store, then sabotage each other in a focus group. Plus, the big loser learns a valuable lesson after crashing a book reading.

programme.title: Friends S9 22
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler mull their options.

programme.title: Friends S9 23
programme.desc: Ross is so excited to deliver a keynote address at a paleontologists convention on Barbados that he procures free passes to the event for all his friends.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Found S1 6

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 15

programme.title: 10,000 Bc
programme.desc: In a remote mountain tribe, the young hunter D'Leh (Steven Strait--The Covenant) has found his heart's passion, the beautiful Evolet (Camilla Belle--When a Stranger Calls). But when mysterious warlords kidnap Evolet, D'Leh leads a small group of hunters to the end of the world to save her -- battling prehistoric predators, braving the harshest elements and learning their ultimate fate lies in an empire beyond imagination, where great pyramids reach into the skies. Here they will take their stand against a tyrannical god. And it is here that D'Leh finally comes to understand that he has been called to save not only Evolet but all of civilization.

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Shark Saviours - Steve Backshall is on a mission to create a new generation of shark saviours, but first he needs to find his team. Steve takes 12 young UK hopefuls to boot camp.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mission Bimini - Steve Backshall has chosen his UK team of six to travel with him to Bimini in the Bahamas, where they learn how to scuba dive and become the next generation of shark saviours.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The presenter takes a train ride into tea country to find out about Ceylon tea. Xander also meets a master Kandyan dancer to learn about Kandy city's annual procession.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Nightmare - A violent attack happened to a tribesman in the Bolivian jungle. Cyril's on a mission to find out what kind of monster fish could be the culprit of such a violent attack.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep10
programme.desc: The Big Catch - Ricko DeWilde teaches his children to survive in the wild as they journey to Huslia. Sue Aikens updates her camp to improve her comfort.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Alaskan Summer - Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for its wildlife.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart
programme.desc: Deep in the Heart - Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep5
programme.desc: De Hoop: Place of Hope - This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africas wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Kogelberg - Considered to be the most beautiful of the Capes protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story - March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the worlds 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are natures best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australias mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and its stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of Chinas land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Alaskan Summer - Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for its wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi - Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Manzi the Superpack - Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centers aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote thats too people-friendly.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who cant walk, and see how the medical team ensures hell be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. Its topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laoss tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Acacia Loop - As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula's Journey - Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure

See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Penguins - At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Untamed West - New Zealands West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales Of Arcadia Ep23
programme.desc: Wingmen - When unexpected guests arrive bringing AAARRRGGHHs past and illness to light Jim finds himself competing in a terrifying game of Pyrobligst.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales Of Arcadia Ep24
programme.desc: Angor Management - Jim and Strickler team up to bring down Angor Rot Meanwhile the Gnome returns with important information regarding Baby Enrique.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep25
programme.desc: Cleo & Zaid - Cleo and Zaid finally find the Uta Tablet, but the people guarding it want Cleo to stay and be their Queen. Which, like, is definitely not the worst offer she's ever gotten.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep26
programme.desc: Pyramid Scheme - This is a big one. I mean, I feel like you should just watch it. There's a huge betrayal and then Octavian totally invades Mayet and then... I've already said too much.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him he just had to be there, but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep42
programme.desc: Scrapbookmobile / Troll Rangers - When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep32
programme.desc: Party Twig / Space Blasters - Cicadas have hatched and due to a misunderstanding, they anoint Twig their Party God, leaving Rocksy, Berry, and Leaf in charge of keeping Twig alive. / The Mighty Ones have an adventure in space i.e. get stuck in patio lights.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep5
programme.desc: Big Man On Berk - Thinking he's allergic to Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep9
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Lantern - Rupert, Edward and Bill go camping. Rupert is excited at the idea of playing explorers' but as darkness falls the friends are frightened by strange shadows and noises.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep10
programme.desc: Ruperts Treasure Hunt - Raggety is getting the wood tidy for the annual visit of the Spring Inspector. If it's not looking its best, Spring won't go ahead and Raggety needs help from Rupert and his friends

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep11
programme.desc: Rupert Flies to Cheddar Moon - When Ping Pong uses her magic to turn Rupert's pedal car into a spaceship they fly to the moon. There they meet the Man on the Moon who runs a cheese stall.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep12
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What's My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Olivia Ep29
programme.desc: Olivia's Day At The Office - When Father takes Olivia and Ian to bring your kids to work day, Olivia is looking forward to a fun day with dad at the office. But when Father is given a new deadline for a big project, Olivia hatches a plan to help him out. First, however they have to track down Ian's missing frog.

programme.title: Olivia Ep30
programme.desc: Olivia Helps Mother Nature - After learning about the environment, Olivia is on a mission to recycle, cut down on waste, and conserve energy. But she just can't get Ian to turn off his light at night. Either she'll have to find a way for Ian to fall asleep without it, or else find a sustainable alternative

programme.title: Olivia Ep31
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Vet - After a trip to the vet with Julian's pet lizard Bernie, Olivia is inspired to become a vet herself. She imagines herself curing all kinds of wild animals, and back home she goes to work on the only two patients available: her pets! Her treatments for Edwin and Perry turn out to be a bit messier than she expected.

programme.title: Olivia Ep32
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Chef - It's Mother's birthday, and Olivia's planning something really special: a surprise dinner, with all red food. Imagining she's a famous chef with Dad and Ian as her helpers, the real challenge is keeping mum out of the kitchen while they prepare her special meal.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land. But only in exchange for one thing. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep32
programme.desc: The Flawed Couple/ Go-Sip Girl - To learn about jobs, Grug assigns kids to the first shadowing/Ugga mistakenly creates the first gossip to impress the nitting club

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep19
programme.desc: The Swiss Mess - The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeards chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for spring has sprung, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as special delivery deputies, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibalds arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep50
programme.desc: Lucky and the Endless Possibilities - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep44
programme.desc: Bobby The Influence / Grill Or Be Grilled - While upholding the law on "The Elder's Court," Bobby is accused of a crime. Richie vows to turn his grilled cheese stand into a profitable business.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep44
programme.desc: He Got Game Night/73 - Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skid's advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep31
programme.desc: Egg's Day Out / The Way of the Snake - Archibald takes care of a lost egg for the day. But when the egg starts to crack, Archibald has to get the egg back to its parents. / After Archibalds arms fall asleep, he joins a dojo ran by snakes and embraces a life without appendages.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep36
programme.desc: Shellabyrinth / Helping Hans - Berry runs away from responsibility only to learn a lesson of responsibility, and then totally disregard the lesson learned because being responsible is a trap. / The Mighty Ones meet a multi-tool named Hans, and find uses for his various attachments, while Hans wrestles with his own self-worth.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep56
programme.desc: My Fair Demon - When a kind, gentle Demon with dreams of being evil emerges from the portal, Puss and the team do their best to teach the monster how to be bad

programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.desc: Bus - During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Queens - During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Undercover Tomato - Tomato paints himself green and goes undercover as a Mini Pea to discover how Evil Pea is firing them at Tato Tower. He makes an unexpected new Mini Pea friend.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep49
programme.desc: The Sewing Badge - Duggee is sewing and makes a snazzy poncho, inspiring the squirrels to make one too. When they hear a very loud sneeze, the group investigates and finds a polar bear with a cold.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Ilulissat, Greenland - Grandmaster Glitch has travelled to Ilulissat in Greenland to show his teddy, Cuddles, the sights. But Cuddles ends up getting stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Light and Dark - Kit and Pup are camping. When it gets dark can you see who turns on the light? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators make shadows using torchlight.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Duck - Dee encourages a friend to say duck and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep86
programme.desc: This Way, That Way - The Teletubbies go 'this way, that way' on a Tubby Car journey to the Hidey Hup. The Tubby Spinny goes 'this way, that way' too.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Silly Things - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Baby Skymoo and the Cloud - While out practising her flying, Baby Skymoo crash lands in Mother Clanger's garden.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Treasure Trouble - Helping Hand has organised a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep66
programme.desc: Construction Obstruction - A Blocker can't do his job without his tools, but he can't get his tools to his job.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Messy-morphosis - Messy monster can't find his caterpillar friends. The garden bush where he left his friends is now covered with pretty butterflies. But where did the caterpillars go? He flutters off to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Thirsty Robot - Messy monster can't work out why his cart won't move. The wheels just won't go round like normal. Off he goes to OKIDO to find out why.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep72
programme.desc: My Family - Monty is teased by a school friend for having a strange family and begins to wish the Kazoops were more like everyone else.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep11
programme.desc: It's Time For An Easter Feast - JoJo, Gran Gran and all the family plan an Easter feast. When there isn't enough space in the kitchen to prepare the food, it's time for a Gran Gran plan outside in the garden.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep4
programme.desc: New River - It hasn't rained in ages, Nelly and Nora find a thirsty flower that needs water.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Castle Scribbling - Whilst visiting a Castle, Sarah & Duck's drawings lead them to an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Cloud Jam - Music Lady needs Sarah & Duck's help to return a music-loving stowaway back to the Cloud Tower.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep10
programme.desc: Percy and the Calliope - Percy tries to fix an old calliope so that it isn't scrapped.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep11
programme.desc: Thomas and the Sounds of Sodor - The Fat Controller arrives at Tidmouth Sheds to give Thomas a special job. Thomas is to collect the Great Composer from Knapford and take him on a tour of the Island so that he can hear the sounds of Sodor.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Markets - When Bluey visits the markets with five bucks from the tooth fairy, the options are endless. But as she and Indy look for the perfect purchase, spending it proves hard.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Toy Aisle Trouble - Evil Pea takes all the toys in the supermarket for herself and the Cobs to play with. Supertato climbs a big wall of boxes to try and get the toys back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S1 Ep2
