programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Born to Be Mild - Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep247
programme.desc: Swamp Mates / One Trick Sponge - Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Wheel and Deal / Feast or Family - Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby. // When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep424
programme.desc: A Dark & Story Night / Sand Hassles - When the lights go out in the Loud House, the kids entertain themselves by taking turns telling parts of a story. // Lucy and the Morticians' Club try to thwart plans for a school field trip to the beach.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Taunting Hour - After Lincoln tries to help Lynn get over a heckler at her soccer game, the Louds realize they all have critics.

programme.title: The Really Loud House S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Manager with the Planager - Lincoln encourages Clyde to showcase his amazing skills as a drummer, but pushes him too far. Luan meets her comedy idol while performing a comedy gig at Sunset Canyon. And Luna helps Leni ace her history test by utilizing her love of fashion.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Shell Game/Blossom Goes Wild! - Gargamel turns himself into a snail so Farmer will bring him back to the Smurfs' Village. // When Blossom gets into a fight with Storm and Lily, she leaves her village and moves into the forest with Wild

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Diaper Daddy - When everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy decides to invent a robot that will do the job.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering - Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place / Plankton Gets the Boot - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep210
programme.desc: Life Insurance / Burst Your Bubble - After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Alpaca Lies - Ronnie Anne and Bobby have to deal with an old friend of Arturo's-Al the Alpaca, but Al has it out for the kids

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Uncredible Journey / Host-a-Palooza - Tinkle, Ouchie, and Pinkeye must venture back home together after being taken away by mistake. // Patrick gets injured, so his family members take turns hosting the show.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Backpay Payback / House Hunting - Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil. // The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Mad Wax / Fails - While being honored at the Celebrity Wax Museum, Captain Man & Kid Danger are attacked by angry wax figures. // Invisible Brad returns & this time he's posting embarrassing videos of Captain Man & Kid Danger until they turn him visible again.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep243
programme.desc: The Nitwitting / The Ballad of Filthy Muck - Patrick inducts SpongeBob into his prestigious society of dullards and doofuses. // Patrick takes his grime to a new extreme, playing around in so much trash that he becomes unrecognizable.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: Plankton Gets the Boot - When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Last Days of Summer / The Littlest Robot - Alvin wastes his entire summer playing a video game then tries to do all the fun things he'd planned in one day. // Simon invents a robot with emotions and an ability to learn which backfires when he's exposed to the internet.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: You Troll / Life of the Party - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments. // The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Fish Talker / Wet Doom - Captain Man and Kid Danger use Schowz' Fish-Talker helmet to help a lost fish find his way home. // While stuck in a restaurant bathroom, Ray, Henry, Charlotte, Jasper, and Schwoz reminisce about past adventures.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Manhattan Project Part 2 - Facing Shredder's deadly new assassin, Leo must decide whether to risk his brother's lives or ask for Splinter's help. Donnie must put aside his rivalry with Casey in order to uncover a new Kraang plot.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep708
programme.desc: One Man Banned / Frenemy Mine - After Timmy's rejected from the school band, he wishes everyone would love his music. // Timmy saves Vicky from a horrible accident and suddenly she is stricken by his generosity.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Dorg and the Germ / Dorg the Troublemaker - Dorg is sick. The Magicals become microscopic to help fight the cold! // The new art teacher decides Dorg's a troublemaker, the gang will do anything to get back in the teacher's good books and win a prize at Art Day!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Winky / Trivial Per Hoot - Felicity is overwhelmed by the responsibility of owning her first pet, a cute but mischievous creature called a Winky. // Athena loses her confidence when, for the first time ever, she gets a fact about Mythlandia wrong.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Fowl Work / Rash Thrash - When Sanjay and Craig get the once in a lifetime opportunity to work at the Frycade, they soon discover Belles secret life. // Sanjay develops an allergy to Craig - could this mean the end of the dude snake duo?

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Hoofsgiving / Capture the Carrot - When a thick fog rolls into Galloping Grove on the eve of the Hoofsgiving Festival, Corn and Peg help light up the community. // Corn and Peg help Ferdy to play 'Capture The Carrot'.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Saving Private Chum Chum / Jingle Fever - Mr. Mufflin takes away everyone's toys in class. Unfortunately this includes taking away Chum Chum! // When Fanboy and Chum Chum find out they can win a million Frosty Bucks by writing the new Frosty Mart jingle.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Purrr-fect Partner / Doom-mates - Dudley Puppy and his new partner, Kitty Katswell, team up to stop Verminious Snaptrap. // When Kittys life is in danger, its up to Dudley to save his crime-fighting sidekick from the villainous Chameleon.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Rusty Dives In / Rusty's Big Top Trouble - When Ruby's tablet winds up at the bottom of the lake, Rusty dives in to save the day. // The circus is coming - but when the engine fails on the circus train, Rusty must figure out how to get it back on track in time for opening night.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Totally Swamped - Wally's grumpy neighbor, Stan of the Swamp, won't give back his new glider unless Wally can make him laugh! Can Wally use his magic stick to make M words that'll get a chuckle out of the swamp monster?

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Bucket Pants / A Best Too Far - Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this year's Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other people's ideas even if they haven't got a war room.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone / The Night Patty - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out - SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep241
programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Dad Jokes - Alvin is alarmed that Dave will be hosting an auction where he'll have to tell jokes because he's not that funny.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: The Chosen Chipmunk - Alvin sneaks into Simon's new virtual reality game and is transported to a world in desperate need of a hero.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Double Dangus - The chipmunks discover Officer Dangus has a twin brother that's a bully and encourage Dangus to stand up to him.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep309

programme.title: AFLW - Second Elimination Final - Geelong Cats v Essendon Ep53
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A doubleheader of AFLW Finals kicks off in Geelong as the Cats host the Bombers in the Second Elimination Final. Geelong finished the season 6th on the ladder and Essendon 7th, but for the loser today the season will be over.

programme.title: AFLW - Second Qualifying Final - Melbourne v North Melbourne Tasmania Ep54
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Reigning Premiers Melbourne begin their AFLW title defence with a Qualifying Final against North Melbourne Tasmania. The Demons finished the season second on the ladder and the Kangaroos in 3rd. The winner gets a week off.

programme.title: Landline Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Compass - Angels, Demons and Money Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Is money the root of all evil? Indira Naidoo is joined by a panel for a thought-provoking discussion on why money has such a hold on us. Can you have too much money? Does money make you happy? How much should you give away?

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Tagilima Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Samoa's Geek Girls: Cybersecurity expert, Tagilima Neemia, is determined to bust the myth that boys are better at science and technology. With the global technology sector booming, she helps Samoan girls get tech-savvy.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Two months before the Republican Primaries begin, the Third GOP Debate could see Ron DeSantis, Nikki Haley, Chris Christie, Vivek Ramaswamy and Tim Scott on stage. Chas and John discuss the latest on Gaza and the week.

programme.title: For Frogs' Sake!
programme.desc: Danielle is a scientist who made a discovery of a lifetime. Follow her through the Australian wilderness as she tells the story, speaks of her love of frogs, the dangers they face and the future of the species.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Wild Wild Wetlands Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin ventures into Australia's notorious swamp country where he encounters the speedy freshwater crocodile, the predatory barramundi and the world's largest reptile, the saltwater crocodile.

programme.title: Project Wild - Tonga Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time Ann explores the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: The First Inventors - Design to Survive Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Could you survive in Australia 65,000 years ago? From engineering volcanic landscapes into fish farms to mastering deadly fire, the unique survival inventions that let First Nations people thrive.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Almah Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - PNG's Mobility Maestro: After losing her leg at age 11, Almah Kuambu became fascinated by how artificial limbs were made. Today, she and her team are determined to reach everyone in need and dispel stigma along the way.

programme.title: Who Gets To Stay In Australia? Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Three women fight to keep their marriages together after their husbands fall foul of the law. Meanwhile, one woman places her own life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Compass - Angels, Demons and Money Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Is money the root of all evil? Indira Naidoo is joined by a panel for a thought-provoking discussion on why money has such a hold on us. Can you have too much money? Does money make you happy? How much should you give away?

programme.title: Art Works - The Social Studio, Food Art, Cash Savage Ep17
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Namila visits the enterprising not-for-profit, The Social Studio; we dive into the ABC archive in search of food; meet South African musician Desire Marea; get a lesson on managing envy; plus, Cash Savage performs.

programme.title: Australian Story - To Elle and Back - Libbi Gorr Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - What ever happened to Elle McFeast? She wowed TV audiences in the 90s with her bold and brassy satire. Then a live interview derailed it all. McFeast's creator Libbi Gorr opens up about the fallout and fighting her way back.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep91
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Kamin Gock.

programme.title: Landline Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep91
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Kamin Gock.

programme.title: Insiders Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - As Federal Politicians head to Canberra for a new sitting week in Parliament, David Speers and the panel analyse the latest in national affairs - the politics and the policies - and break down how it affects all Australians.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep44
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Kelli Underwood and the panel discuss the week in sport including Australia's matches against Afghanistan and Bangladesh chasing a spot in the Cricket World Cup Semi Finals, the first week 1 of AFLW Finals, plus A-League.

programme.title: Australian Story - To Elle and Back - Libbi Gorr Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - What ever happened to Elle McFeast? She wowed TV audiences in the 90s with her bold and brassy satire. Then a live interview derailed it all. McFeast's creator Libbi Gorr opens up about the fallout and fighting her way back.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and international markets, analysing what's going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep43
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep226
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Bridget Brennan, Tony Armstrong and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep226
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep226
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Costa tours a potted paradise, Hannah builds a reo mesh arch, Jane visits a legacy garden, Jerry fights pests, Sophie meets a creative couple, Millie features underrated evergreens, and Tammy dives into aquatic plants.

programme.title: Breaking the Code: Cyber Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Australian spies are on the offensive against cyber criminal networks and foreign actors seeking to disrupt democracies. But our intelligence agencies have a long history playing a key role in secret battles.

programme.title: Landline Ep40

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: dealing with a complaint from a neighbor. Luu Van Chien, from Vietnam, works as a carpenter. In a roleplay challenge, he deals with a complaint from a neighbor living near a construction site.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street Mini
programme.desc: Located in the northwest region of China, Dunhuang flourished as a major stop along the Silk Road for more than 2000 years. In this episode we meet residents who cherish their time-honored traditions.

programme.title: Kaizoku: Nii Oshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Nii Oshima Island.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 12, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: the piano with silent system & plastic food models.

programme.title: Bosai: Heavy Snow
programme.desc: Heavy snow falling in a short time can threaten lives when it piles up on roofs, paralyzes roads, and brings social functions to a halt. We'll examine the reasons why heavy snows falls on Japan.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Along Japan's famous, clear river, cute kitties are living their best lives. Join one kitty on a unique bridge leading to his canoe shop, and take in a lovely sunset with other cuties.

programme.title: Core Kyoto

programme.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 295: Prochzka vs. Pereira
programme.desc: Main Event - The Worlds Most Famous Arena is the perfect setting for an epic championship doubleheader on November 12, as UFC celebrates its 30th anniversary in Madison Square Garden. In the explosive UFC 295 main event, Jiri Prochazka attempts to regain his 205-pound crown against former middleweight king Alex Pereira in about fans have been waiting for. Plus, its another Fight of the Year candidate in the co-main event when Russian powerhouse Sergei Pavlovich takes on British banger Tom Aspinall for the interim UFC heavyweight title.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Main Event - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: Middleweight champion Israel The Last Stylebender Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert The Reaper Whittaker. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.

programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 281 as middleweight champion Israel Adesanya faced former foe Alex Pereira. Plus, Carla Esparza had her first title defense against former champion Zhang Weili. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.
